com.pi4j.component

Interface ComponentListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnalogSensorListener, ButtonHoldListener, ButtonListener, ButtonPressedListener, ButtonReleasedListener, ButtonStateChangeListener, DimmableLightListener, DistanceSensorListener, LightListener, MotionSensorListener, PowerListener, RelayListener, SensorListener, SwitchListener, TemperatureListener

    public interface ComponentListener
extends EventListener
